Just add this fine piece of code to your ~/.vimrc: 
 function! CleverTab()
           if pumvisible()
             return "\"
           endif
   if strpart( getline('.'), 0, col('.')-1 ) =~ '^s*$'
      return "\"
           elseif exists('&omnifunc') && &omnifunc != ''
              return "\"
           else
              return "\"
          endif
endfunction
inoremap  =CleverTab()
